comments:
I opened up a 3.2 workspace with N20060421-0010 (with the text patch).

I disabled auto-build, selected org.eclipse.ui.workbench and did a replace>another branch or version created the date Nov 10, 2005 and let it run.

I then got 1000 popups about an error, see the log ... dismissing one opened the next.
